server._comment: The settings in which the Kyoukai server will run on.

endpoints._comment: The endpoints in which we should watch (and whether they're enabled).

pages._comment: The pages in which we should statically should it be requested.

meta._comment: The meta tags for the static web pages that you serve (For SEO).
meta.name: Random Example API
meta.description: This API pulls up random photos of Examples.
